verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> unto all Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3967><s%>, I am an hundred and twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%>; I can <S%H3201><s%> no more go out <S%H3318><s%> and come in <S%H935><s%>: also the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H5674><s%>, You shall not go over this Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, he will go over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H8045><s%>, and he will destroy these nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H3423><s%>, and you shall possess them <S%H3091><s%>: and Joshua, he shall go over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H3068><s%>, as the Lord has said <S%H1696><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall do <S%H6213><s%> unto them as he did <S%H6213><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and to Og <S%H5747><s%>, kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and unto the land <S%H776><s%> of them <S%H8045><s%>, whom he destroyed.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall give them up <S%H5414><s%> before your face <S%H6440><s%>, that you may do <S%H6213><s%> unto them according unto all the commandments <S%H4687><s%> which I have commanded you <S%H6680><s%>.

Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and of a good courage <S%H553><s%>, fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H6206><s%>, nor be afraid of them <S%H6440><s%>: for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, he it is that does go <S%H1980><s%> with you <S%H7503><s%>; he will not fail you <S%H5800><s%>, nor forsake you.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and of a good courage <S%H553><s%>: for you must go <S%H935><s%> with this people <S%H5971><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H5157><s%>; and you shall cause them to inherit it.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, he it is that does go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H7503><s%>; he will be with you, he will not fail you <S%H5800><s%>, neither forsake you <S%H3372><s%>: fear not <S%H2865><s%>, neither be dismayed.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> this law <S%H8451><s%>, and delivered <S%H5414><s%> it unto the priests <S%H3548><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, which bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and unto all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> them <S%H559><s%>, saying, At the end <S%H7093><s%> of every seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, in the solemnity <S%H4150><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%> of release <S%H8059><s%>, in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%>,

When all Israel <S%H3478><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> to appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which he shall choose <S%H977><s%>, you shall read <S%H7121><s%> this law <S%H8451><s%> before all Israel <S%H3478><s%> in their hearing <S%H241><s%>.

Gather <S%H6950><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> together <S%H6950><s%>, men <S%H582><s%>, and women <S%H802><s%>, and sons <S%H2945><s%>, and your stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is inside your gates <S%H8179><s%>, that they may hear <S%H8085><s%>, and that they may learn <S%H3925><s%>, and fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%>:

And that their sons <S%H1121><s%>, which have not known <S%H3045><s%> any thing <S%H8085><s%>, may hear, and learn <S%H3925><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, as long as <S%H3117><s%> you live <S%H2416><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> where you go over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Behold <S%H3117><s%>, your days approach <S%H7126><s%> that you must die <S%H4191><s%>: call <S%H7121><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and present <S%H3320><s%> yourselves in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, that I may give him a charge <S%H6680><s%>. And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went <S%H3212><s%>, and presented <S%H3320><s%> themselves in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of a cloud <S%H6051><s%>: and the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> over the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Behold <S%H7901><s%>, you shall sleep with your fathers <S%H1><s%>; and this people <S%H5971><s%> will rise up <S%H6965><s%>, and go a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of the strangers <S%H5236><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, where they go <S%H935><s%> to be among <S%H7130><s%> them <S%H5800><s%>, and will forsake me <S%H6565><s%>, and break my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I have made with them <S%H3772><s%>.

Then my anger <S%H639><s%> shall be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against them in that day <S%H3117><s%>, and I will forsake <S%H5800><s%> them <S%H5641><s%>, and I will hide my face <S%H6440><s%> from them <S%H398><s%>, and they shall be devoured, and many <S%H7227><s%> evils <S%H7451><s%> and troubles <S%H6869><s%> shall happen to <S%H4672><s%> them <S%H559><s%>; so that they will say in that day <S%H3117><s%>, Are not these evils <S%H7451><s%> come <S%H4672><s%> upon us <S%H430><s%>, because our God is not among us <S%H7130><s%>?

And I will surely <S%H5641><s%> hide <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> for all the evils <S%H7451><s%> which they shall have worked <S%H6213><s%>, in that <S%H3588><s%> they are turned <S%H6437><s%> unto other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>.

Now therefore write <S%H3789><s%> you this song <S%H7892><s%> for you <S%H3925><s%>, and teach it the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: put <S%H7760><s%> it in their mouths <S%H6310><s%>, that this song <S%H7892><s%> may be a witness <S%H5707><s%> for me against the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

For when I shall have brought <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H127><s%> which I swore <S%H7650><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>, that flows <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>; and they shall have eaten <S%H398><s%> and filled <S%H7646><s%> themselves <S%H1878><s%>, and grown fat; then will they turn <S%H6437><s%> unto other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> them <S%H5006><s%>, and provoke me <S%H6565><s%>, and break my covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H7227><s%>, when many evils <S%H7451><s%> and troubles <S%H6869><s%> are happened <S%H4672><s%> them <S%H7892><s%>, that this song shall testify <S%H6030><s%> against <S%H6440><s%> them as a witness <S%H5707><s%>; for it shall not be forgotten <S%H7911><s%> out of the mouths <S%H6310><s%> of their seed <S%H2233><s%>: for I know <S%H3045><s%> their imagination <S%H3336><s%> which they go about <S%H6213><s%>, even now <S%H3117><s%>, before I have brought <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> which I swore <S%H7650><s%>.
Moses <S%H4872><s%> therefore wrote <S%H3789><s%> this song <S%H7892><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%>, and taught <S%H3925><s%> it the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And he gave Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> a charge <S%H6680><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and of a good courage <S%H553><s%>: for you shall bring <S%H935><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which I swore unto them <S%H7650><s%>: and I will be with you.

And it came to pass <S%H4872><s%>, when Moses had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of writing <S%H3789><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%>, until they were finished <S%H8552><s%>,
That Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, which bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> this book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> it by the side <S%H6654><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, that it may be there for a witness against you <S%H5707><s%>.

For I know <S%H3045><s%> your rebellion <S%H4805><s%>, and your stiff <S%H7186><s%> neck <S%H6203><s%>: behold <S%H2416><s%>, while I am yet alive with you this day <S%H3117><s%>, you have been rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and how much more after <S%H310><s%> my death <S%H4194><s%>?

Gather <S%H6950><s%> unto me all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, and your officers <S%H7860><s%>, that I may speak <S%H1696><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> in their ears <S%H241><s%>, and call <S%H5749><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> to record against them <S%H5749><s%>.

For I know <S%H3045><s%> that after <S%H310><s%> my death <S%H4194><s%> you will utterly <S%H7843><s%> corrupt <S%H7843><s%> yourselves <S%H5493><s%>, and turn aside from the way <S%H1870><s%> which I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H7451><s%>; and evil will happen to <S%H7122><s%> you in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; because you will do <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, to provoke him to anger <S%H3707><s%> through the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hands <S%H3027><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of all the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this song <S%H7892><s%>, until they were ended <S%H8552><s%>.
